text:
Filippos Petsalnikos (; 1 December 1950 – 13 March 2020) was a Greek politician. He was a member of the Movement of Democratic Socialists. From 2009 to 2012, he was Speaker of the Hellenic Parliament. Before, he was a Member of the Hellenic Parliament from 1985 to 2012. He was born in Mavrochori, Greece.
Petsalnikos died of leukemia on 13 March 2020 in Athens, aged 69.
